Research Publications

  LE Ngoc Luyen, Yannis Haralambous, Philippe Lenca, Towards a DRS Parsing Framework for French, Six International Conference on Social Networks Analysis, Management and Security (SNAMS), 2019, Granada, Spain.
  LE Ngoc Luyen, Yannis Haralambous, CCG Supertagging Using Morphological and Dependency Syntax Information, Proceedings of the 20th International Conference on Computational Linguistics and Intelligent Text Processing (CICLING), 2019, La Rochelle, France.
  LE Ngoc Luyen, Yannis Haralambous, Philippe Lenca, Détection du Déficit d'Information dans un Fil de Discussion, Séminaire du Département d’Informatique de l’IMT Atlantique, 2018, L’Aberwrac’h, France.
  LE Ngoc Luyen, Anne Tireau, Aravind Venkatesan, Pascal Neveu, Pierre Larmande Development of a knowledge system for Big Data: Case study to plant phenotyping data, Proceedings of the 6th International Conference on Web Intelligence, Mining and Semantics (WIMS'16), 2016, Nimes, France.
  LE Ngoc Luyen, Stéphane Jouannic, Pascal Gantet, Pierre Larmande, Development of a generic indexing tool to optimize the use of biological data, Journées Ouvertes Biologie Informatique Mathématiques (JOBIM'15), 2015, Clérmont-Ferrand, France.
